johnDoe.name: John Doe
johnDoe.title: Lead Developer
johnDoe.bio: John is a lead developer with over 10 years of experience in API development and testing. He specializes in creating robust testing frameworks and automation tools.

janeDoe.name: Jane Doe
janeDoe.title: API Specialist
janeDoe.bio: Jane is an API specialist with expertise in RESTful and GraphQL APIs. She focuses on API design, documentation, and testing methodologies.

bobSmith.name: Bob Smith
bobSmith.title: QA Engineer
bobSmith.bio: Bob is a QA engineer with a passion for ensuring software quality. He has extensive experience in test automation, CI/CD integration, and performance testing.
